name: h3-js
description: Emscripten transpiled libh3 'bindings' for Node/Web JS
author: David Ellis <isv.damocles@gmail.com>

scripts.test: yarn dist-test && yarn lint && yarn test-es6 && yarn test-dist && yarn test-parity
scripts.test-browser: yarn dist-test && budo dist/test/index.js -t babelify --open --title 'h3-wasm tests'
scripts.view-cover: istanbul cover -x out/*.js --report=html -- test/index.js && open coverage/index.html
scripts.dist: yarn dist-clean && mkdir -p dist/out && buble -i lib -o dist/lib && cp out/libh3.js dist/out
scripts.benchmark-browser: yarn dist-benchmark && budo dist/benchmark/browser.js -t babelify --open --title 'h3-js benchmarks'
scripts.build-docs: jsdoc2md --global-index-format grouped --partial doc-files/scope.hbs --helper ./doc-files/insert-version.js --separators --template doc-files/README.tmpl.md lib/h3core.js > README.md
